DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether pramipexole bromocriptine effective treatment non-motor symptom Parkinson 's Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Pramipexole Bromocriptine Nonmotor Symptoms Early Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVE Evaluate Improvement Nonmotor symptom scale ( NMSS ) Pramipexole Bromocriptine early Parkinson 's disease 24-week treatment SECONDARY OBJECTIVE - Evaluate improvement Depression one Nonmotor symptoms - Evaluate improvement clinical symptom two group - Evaluate improvement Quality Life two group
DOC.criteria: Parkinson 's disease patient accordance UK Queensquare Brain Bank modify Hoehn & Yahr stage < 3 Dopamine agent ( Levodopa , dopamine agonist ) naive patient , patient discontinue agent least four week screen case use dopamine agent administer . KMMSE < 24 History druginduced Parkinsonism secondary parkinsonism History schizophrenia hallucination Requirement treatment antidepressant due depressive disorder Pregnant and/or breed woman Renal inadequacy
